summary:
Caitlyn Jenner on ‘Fox & Friends’: The left has ‘hijacked and politicized’ the trans community - Fox News contributor Caitlyn Jenner accused the left of politicizing the transgender community, warning they are 'driving this country apart.' Jenner joined 'Fox & Friends' on Monday to discuss a report alleging Vermont female high school athletes were banned from their locker room over their objections to a transgender student.

  -
